channel.title: [317] how to add special attacks to weapons?
channel.description:
First thing ima tell u.
1. YES IVE GOOGLED IT. 2. Yes i've looked for tutorials and cant find any. 3. Don't tell me to look harder because i already did.
kk now, all im asking for is how to add special attack to any weapons in the server.
Give me link for a tutorial or something please.

item.title: [317] how to add special attacks to weapons?
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

you first need the gfx of the special you want… you can find those urself. then you need to co into client.java and search if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == then look for if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (weapon id) && special amount, etc and copy and paste that above/below it. Change the weapon id and special gfx for it.

Then search for if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == again and just repeat the same thing as last time.

Finally go into special.java and add the special case.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] how to add special attacks to weapons?
